history.content:
About the job

Python / Excel Data Analyst – Drive Impact at a Hyper-Growth B Corp!


Are you ready to blend Python prowess with spreadsheet wizardry inside a purpose-driven tech outfit? The company, a certified B Corp with an NPS above 80, is scaling fast near Walsall and needs a data-savvy problem-solver to turn numbers into growth fuel.


🚀 Why Join?

    🌱 Do good, feel good – ethical mission baked into every decision.
    📈 Hyper-growth vibes – small team, big £2 bn+ platform momentum.
    🧑‍🤝‍🧑 Tight-knit culture – collaborate daily with data, IT & product pros.
    💰 Perks that pop – up to £35 k, 25 days holiday, private medical, EV lease, wellness stipend & 10 % pension.

🛠️ What You’ll Do

    🔍 Query, cleanse & model datasets with Python (pandas, NumPy, SQLAlchemy).
    📊 Build slick Excel dashboards that make insights jump off the screen.
    ⚙️ Automate reporting pipelines, spot trends, boost revenue decisions.
    🤝 Team up with engineers to surface data in customer-facing tools.
    🎯 Handle ad-hoc analytics for marketing, product & ops.

💡 Core Skill Set

    🎓 Degree in Computer Science, Statistics, Economics (or similar).
    1 + year in a Data Analyst role.
    Python data-wrangling mastery.
    Excel power-user (Power Query, pivots; VBA a plus).
    Bonus: BI / viz chops (Power BI, Tableau, Matplotlib, Plotly).
    Clear communicator who makes complex data simple.

🌟 Impact & Growth

Join a social, supportive squad of specialists who’ve each made a mark within their first months. Expect mentorship, space for passion projects and a runway to sharpen every facet of your analytics toolkit.

Ready to channel code, cells & charts into world-bettering impact? Apply now and start making data count!

**Pranup Chhetri**
+44 7899507289 | pranupchhetri27@gmail.com | linkedin.com/in/pranup/

**Personal Profile**

Data-driven analyst with a Master's degree in Artificial Intelligence and a proven ability to transform complex data into actionable insights. Skilled in Python (pandas, NumPy), Excel (Power Query, pivots), and data visualisation techniques. Experience in developing and implementing data pipelines, conducting statistical analysis, and automating reporting processes. Eager to apply analytical skills and contribute to data-informed decision-making within a fast-paced, purpose-driven organisation.

**Experience**

**Freelance AI Trainer and Prompt Engineer**
DataAnnotation Tech | Birmingham | April 2025 – Present

*   Conducted high-quality evaluations of large language models for STEM, Python Programming, and Data Analysis tasks.
*   Created criteria for model evaluation and provided feedback for Reinforcement Learning with Human Feedback (RLHF) pipelines.
*   Evaluated the correctness of claims via research to evaluate model truthfulness and ensure objective feedback.

**Project Engineer**
Wipro Technologies | Chennai, India | Jun 2022 - Sept 2023

*   Tested and optimised software performance for Nokia’s Optical Communication Devices, enhancing network reliability.
*   Designed and implemented automated testing pipelines for network cards, simulating real-world conditions.
*   Developed custom automation tools to support software version migration, improving engineering efficiency by up to 80%.

**Education**

**Master of Science in Artificial Intelligence**
Aston University, Birmingham, UK | January 2025
Achieved distinctions in all taught modules and research modules.
Recipient of Departmental Prizes:
*   Outstanding MSc Project
*   Outstanding Performance in MSc Artificial Intelligence

**Bachelor of Engineering in Computer Science**
Sambhram Institute of Technology, Bangalore, India | 2018-2022
Achieved First Class with Distinction and a cumulative GPA of 8.62.

**A-level Equivalent in Science (CBSE)**
Army School, Bengdubi, India | 2018

**Projects**

**MSc Dissertation Research: Social Navigation using GNNs**

*   Developed a spatio-temporal GNN metric to evaluate autonomous robot navigation using human-rated data.
*   Used PyTorch Geometric Temporal (PyGT) for implementing S-TGNN models and TGCN layers.
*   Designed a full ETL pipeline to extract pose features and navigation metrics into dynamic graph structures.
*   Collaborated with international researchers to validate model generalisability across varied social navigation settings

**Classification Model for UCI Bank Marketing Dataset**

*   Built a weighted Random UnderSampler Boosted classification model to predict sales outcomes.
*   Analysed, preprocessed, and identified data characteristics and experimented with various models.
*   Implemented a weighted Random UnderSampler (RUS) boosted classification model, yielding an Area Under Curve of 0.86.

**Skills**

*   **Programming Languages:** Python
*   **Data Engineering & Analytics:** ETL, Data Integration, Preprocessing, Visualisation, SQL
*   **Libraries & Frameworks:** Pandas, Numpy, Sklearn
*   **DevOps & Tools:** Git, Linux, JIRA, Trello

Pranup Chhetri
+44 7899507289, pranupchhetri27@gmail.com, linkedin.com/in/pranup/

Dear Hiring Manager,

I am writing to express my interest in the Python / Excel Data Analyst position advertised. With my background in Artificial Intelligence and practical experience in data analysis, I am confident I possess the skills and qualifications necessary to contribute to your hyper-growth B Corp.

My MSc in Artificial Intelligence, coupled with my hands-on experience, has equipped me with a strong foundation in Python data-wrangling using pandas and NumPy. As demonstrated by my MSc Dissertation research where I developed an ETL pipeline to extract pose features and navigation metrics into dynamic graph structures and implemented S-TGNN models using PyTorch Geometric Temporal (PyGT), I have a proven ability to query, cleanse, and model datasets effectively.

While my CV highlights my expertise in Python, I am also proficient in Excel. I have experience using Excel for creating data insights. During my time as a Project Engineer at Wipro Technologies, I developed custom automation tools using Python which were used to update configuration variables across multiple files, this improved engineering efficiency by up to 80%.

I am eager to learn more about this opportunity and discuss how my skills and experience can contribute to your team's success. Thank you for your time and consideration.

Sincerely,

Pranup Chhetri
